mapper.select: select top(1) isnull(voucher_no,0)+1 from contract_information order by voucher_no desc

select distinct top(30) contract_no from contract_information where 1=1 -- where is_delete=0 and settlement_identification=1
and contract_no like '%'+#{htbh}+'%'
and contract_type = #{httype}
order by contract_no desc
